pos_mean_info_list.mean: 令人恐惧的；骇人的；极大的
使害怕，使恐怖（terrify的现在分词）
恐怖主义；恐怖行动；恐怖统治

word_mean_info__list.difference: 强调突然意识到有危险而产生的恐惧心理。
常指因突如其来的外界威胁使人群出现惊慌、恐惧或混乱。
指极大的恐惧和惊骇，语气最强。
可与fear换用，着重害怕的心理，但dread常指胆怯和丧失勇气。
侧重指因看到令人讨厌或危险的东西或情景而引起的厌恶情绪、极度恐惧心情或战栗的动作。
通常指一阵突然的、令人震惊的短暂恐惧，有时含夸张意味。
普通用词，侧重指面临危险或灾祸时内心所引起的恐惧心情。

word_group.brief_definition: 纯粹的恐怖；完全的恐怖
卑鄙的恐怖；卑贱的恐怖
模拟恐怖练习；模仿恐怖练习

bilingual.source: The guillotine was a symbol of the Reign of Terror.
bilingual.target: 断头台是恐怖统治的象征。

bilingual.source: His face turned pale with terror during the horror movie.
bilingual.target: 在看恐怖电影时，他的脸因恐惧而变得苍白。

bilingual.source: But my grandmother was a terror for that kind of thing.
bilingual.target: 但是我的祖母常说起那种恐怖的事情。

bilingual.source: The terror attacks in Paris last November were called Europe's worst in the past decade.
bilingual.target: 去年11月巴黎发生的恐怖袭击被称为欧洲过去十年来最严重的一次恐怖袭击。

bilingual.source: You have to read the "House of terror" by Constanza Vanges, which is about strange things that start happening in a house.
bilingual.target: 你必须读康斯坦察·范格斯的《恐怖之家》，这是关于在一所房子里开始发生的奇怪的事情。

bilingual.source: He will be the terror of mankind.

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, look at me! I'm Earl "The Terror" Thompson!
yingyinNormal.zh: 看我，我是“恐怖份子”。

yingyinNormal.en: The Monstrous Nightmare. Firepower 15. The Terrible Terror. Attack 8, venom 12.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猛烈凶魇，火力15级。恐怖龙，攻击性8级、毒性12级。

yingyinNormal.en: All very interesting, Sherlock, but the terror alert has been raised to critical.
yingyinNormal.zh: 都很有意思，夏洛克，但恐怖袭击预警等级已达到"危急"。

yingyinNormal.en: I will find your underground terror cell, Mycroft. Just put me back in London.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会找出你所谓的地下恐怖组织的麦克罗夫特，只需将我放归伦敦。

yingyinNormal.en: Did they conspire? Did they use terror and this evacuation to cost me this election?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们串通了吗？他们是不是想用恐怖和此次疏散让我输掉这场大选？

yingyinNormal.en: And he's gone rogue, unfortunately intend on dismantling an imaginary terror network.
yingyinNormal.zh: 组织一解散，他就叛逃了，他一心想企图捣毁一个并不存在的恐怖犯罪组织。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. President, we're already working together on several fronts: nonproliferation, the War on Terror, North Korea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总统先生，我们已经在多个方面展开了合作，扩散防止协议，打击恐怖主义，朝鲜。

yingyinNormal.en: It's like a one-man reign of terror. This bat vigilante has been consistently targeting the port and the adjacent projects and tenements.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就像恐怖统治，这位蝙蝠义警总是出现在港口以及周围的民宅和廉租房。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey! Look at that old fella, racking up the big numbers! Don, that old fella is Earl "The Terror" Thompson! What? Where? That's really him?
yingyinNormal.zh: 看那个分数快破表的老头。老唐，那个老头是“恐怖份子”。什么？哪里？真的是他。

yingyinNormal.en: Mark. Ahmadi has consistently encouraged acts of terror like this one. What makes you think that any sort of dialogue will lead to a peaceful resolution?
yingyinNormal.zh: 马克。艾哈迈德一向鼓励这样的恐怖行动，你为什么认为任何的对话能带来和平的结果？

yingyinNormal.en: This would support your suspicion that a shadow organization is committed to inciting revolution, by enabling acts of terror in nations friendly to Western interests.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这也印证了你之前的怀疑，有一个秘密组织在那些对西方利益集团交好的国家中通过恐怖主义行动来煽动革命。

yingyinNormal.en: No other term is relevant. I think we have been operating under the shadow of terror for too long. For the sake of the American people, we need to act now. What's the timetable, General?
yingyinNormal.zh: 短期没错就够了。我想我们已经在恐怖主义的阴影下忍受太久了。为了美国人民，我们必须采取坚决行动。预计需要多少时间，将军？

yingyinNormal.en: Her last moments of terror still frozen on her face.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她临终时的恐惧仍定格在她的脸上。

yingyinNormal.en: Our only security lies in preemptive attack. We will fight terror with terror.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们只有先发制人才能自保，我们要以暴治暴。

yingyinNormal.en: I laid low your warriors of old. I instill terror in the hearts of men.
yingyinNormal.zh: 旧日的矮人勇士都倒在我脚下，吓得魂不附体。

yingyinNormal.en: Mama is an old intriguer. She will use tears or terror with equal facility.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈妈最会老谋深算，她会软硬兼施的。

yingyinNormal.en: But Smek wisely fled in terror. And he took a great trophy: the Shusher. Run away!
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是斯迈克船长在恐惧中明智的逃走了。然后他得到了一个特殊的战利品，嘘嘘。跑啊！

yingyinNormal.en: I'd live in terror, dreading every race, every practice, every trial. I cannot do it!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会活得心惊胆战，每次他比赛练习，试驾，都忧心忡忡，我做不到！

yingyinNormal.en: Terror is unacceptable. I do not accept it. But we will not be deterred by Washington's failure to address it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 恐惧是不可接受的。我拒绝接受。但我们不能被华盛顿的处理不力拖后腿。

yingyinNormal.en: She was alive because she listened to her father and lived her life in routine and darkness and terror. So she was happy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她还活着是因为她听她父亲的话并且一生循规蹈矩，在黑暗与恐惧中度过，所以她很幸福。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Its Campaign to Protect Rural England struck <highlight>terror</highlight> into many local Conservative parties.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的“保护英格兰乡村运动”让当地许多保守党感到恐惧。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>terror</highlight> attacks in Paris last November were called Europe's worst in the past decade.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去年11月巴黎发生的恐怖袭击被称为欧洲过去十年来最严重的一次恐怖袭击。

examination_example.sentence: Italy signed an accord with UNESCO to establish a task force to protect cultural heritage from natural disasters and <highlight>terror</highlight> groups.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 意大利与联合国教科文组织签署了一项正式协议，以建立一支特别行动组，用于保护文化遗产免受自然灾害和恐怖组织的破坏。

examination_example.sentence: But my grandmother was a <highlight>terror</highlight> for that kind of thing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是我的祖母常说起那种恐怖的事情。
